lines: 1. Ok wangeyo saa ma nobie,kat` okinyi, kat` odhiambo,Di po kobiro ka piny chido,kata saa ma piny dwaro ru.Ochikowa mondo warite,kik wawe techewa otho,Mondo ka obiro oyudwawan duto kwarito Ruodhwa.
Wa rito Ruodhwa;(warito kendo wakiyo Ruodhwa;)Warito Ruodhwa;(warito kendo wakiyo Ruodhwa;)Warito Ruodhwa;Warito kendo wakiyo Ruoth.

2. Aparo ng`wonone maduong` ngang`,ma nomiye thonwa e yath,Koweyo duong`ne polo malo,mond` otho ni jo maricho.Ang`eyo ka Ruodhwa dimor ngang`ka jogo ma notho nigi mor,Ka gikiyo duok Ruodhwa,ka giduto rite pile.
3. Ruoth Yesu, jawarna mohera,Ing`eyo kaheri adier;Ageno naneni gi wang`aka iniruaka e polo.Kibiro kaka jang`ad burani jogo maringo wang`i,An to anamosi, Osiepna;An to arito bironi.
